title: Worktree Support for Multi-Agent Task Isolation
description: Enable multiple Claude Code instances to run in isolation using git worktrees. When tasks move to 'In Progress', spawn Claude Code in dedicated worktrees. Each task can optionally share a worktree or get its own isolated workspace.

title: create roadmap tab to mimic auto-claude roadmap tab
description: Add a roadmap tab similar to Auto-Claude (https://github.com/AndyMik90/Auto-Claude) that visualizes project planning and progress. Should show high-level project goals, milestones, and dependencies in a visual format.

title: PTY Session Persistence
description: Implement session save and restore functionality for terminal panes using tmux or screen integration, allowing PTY sessions to survive application restarts with full history preserved.
close_reason: Implemented native PTY session persistence with scrollback capture and restoration

title: Implement delete functionality for roadmap items
description: Add keyboard shortcut and confirmation dialog to delete roadmap items, with proper state cleanup.

title: ctrl+c warning that if you are sure you want to close chloe, either hit enter or press the same combination keys again
description: Add a safety confirmation when user presses Ctrl+C to quit the application. Show a warning message and require either Enter key or a second Ctrl+C press to confirm exit. This prevents accidental quits.

title: implement the terminal tab, see the kanban tab layout

Add worktree selection UI when creating tasks
description: Add UI dialog when creating new task/terminal that asks user to select worktree. Show list of existing worktrees (with task associations) and option to create new worktree (default).

title: Auto-approve Claude Code workspace when starting tasks
description: When moving a task to 'In Progress', the terminal opens with Claude Code but prompts for workspace approval. The workflow should automatically approve the workspace to avoid manual intervention.

title: Add roadmap tab to application
description: Create new Tab variant for Roadmap, add tab switching logic, and integrate into main event loop and UI rendering.

title: Add Ctrl+T shortcut for new task popup in kanban
make the kanban tab more pretty, add colors and have these tabs: Planning, In Progress, Review, Done
description:
Research and implement visual improvements to the kanban board UI.

Goals:
- Research existing kanban CLI tools (taskwarrior, kanban-cli, etc.) to understand best practices for terminal-based kanban UIs
- Update column structure: Planning → In Progress → Review → Done (instead of current To Do/In Progress/Done)
- Add color coding to improve visual hierarchy and readability
- Enhance overall aesthetics while maintaining usability

Implementation approach:
1. Research popular kanban CLI tools and document design patterns
2. Plan color scheme that works well in terminals
3. Update column definitions in kanban/state.rs
4. Implement styling in kanban/ui.rs
5. Test with various terminal color schemes

title: Implement roadmap persistence (save/load)
description: Add serialization/deserialization for roadmap state to JSON, integrate with existing persistence layer to save/load roadmap data across sessions.

title: Implement roadmap kanban board with columns
description: Create kanban-style layout for roadmap with status-based columns (Backlog, Planning, Ready, In Progress, Done). Render columns with appropriate colors and navigation.

title: Handle worktree cleanup on task completion
description: Handle worktree lifecycle: merge changes back to main when task completes, cleanup worktree and branch, handle merge conflicts (prompt user), option to keep worktree for debugging.

title: Implement AI-assisted roadmap generation
description: Integrate with Claude API to generate roadmap items based on project analysis. Include progress tracking and cancellation support.

title: Create roadmap tab UI layout and item cards
description: Implement basic roadmap UI with list/card view of roadmap items showing title, description, and status. Use ratatui widgets similar to kanban cards.

title: move the task tag and title from the card body to it's top border
Add Claude Code spawn with worktree setup on task start
description: When task moves to 'In Progress', spawn Claude Code instance in selected worktree. Initial prompt should ask Claude to: 1) Set up worktree based on main workspace (detect language, install deps), 2) Execute the assigned task.

title: Add roadmap item creation and editing
description: Implement dialogs for creating new roadmap items and editing existing ones. Include fields for title, description, rationale, user stories, and acceptance criteria.

title: Implement custom scrollback buffer (vt100 bug workaround)
description: vt100's set_scrollback() causes panics with 'attempt to subtract with overflow' in grid.rs:125:42 when scrolling. Need to implement our own scrollback buffer that captures lines as they scroll off the terminal.
close_reason: Implemented custom scrollback buffer as workaround for vt100 bug

title: Enhanced Kanban Task Workflow
Move task from Planning to In Progress and start Claude Code instance
description: When a task is moved from Planning to In Progress, automatically launch a Claude Code terminal instance in the Instances tab with the task context

title: Add confirmation dialog when moving task backwards from In Progress to Planning
description: Show a warning popup that moving backwards will terminate the Claude Code instance. Require user confirmation before terminating the instance and moving the task back to Planning

title: Implement pause/resume for In Progress tasks with 'p' key
description: Press 'p' to pause execution (sends ESC to Claude Code terminal). Press 'p' again to resume (types 'continue' in terminal). Update task status indicator to show paused state

title: Auto-detect Claude Code completion and move task to Review
description: Monitor Claude Code terminal output for completion signals. Automatically transition task from In Progress to Review column when Claude Code finishes execution

title: Create Review popup with Claude Code output display
description: When Enter is pressed on a task in Review, show popup displaying the last Claude Code output with scrollable view

title: Implement Review workflow action buttons
description: Add action buttons to Review popup: 'Review in IDE' (opens default IDE), 'Review in Terminal' (switches to instances tab), text input for change requests, and 'Mark Complete' button

title: Implement request changes flow from Review back to In Progress
description: When user types changes in Review popup, move task back to In Progress and queue the change request as next prompt to Claude Code terminal

title: Create roadmap data structures and state management
description: Define Rust structs for roadmap items (title, description, rationale, user stories, acceptance criteria, status, etc.) and RoadmapState to manage the collection of items.

title: Add drag-and-drop support for roadmap items
description: Implement keyboard-based drag-and-drop (or move left/right) functionality to move roadmap items between columns, similar to kanban task movement.

title: Auto-start task in terminal when moved to In Progress
description:
When a task is moved to the 'In Progress' column in the kanban board, automatically create a new terminal pane in the Terminals tab and start working on the task.

Additionally, add a keyboard shortcut (T key) that allows jumping directly to a task's associated terminal in the Terminals tab when pressed while a task is selected in the kanban board.

This integrates the kanban workflow with the terminal execution environment and provides quick navigation between planning and execution contexts.
